oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Invalid claim for pension for Alexander D. Frazier, Co. B, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Frazier served from Carter County (Tenn.) in Co. B, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. He is submitting his claim for a Civil War pension and applying for an increase in his pension due to disability from "Disease of heart, Neuralgia, and rheumatism." At the time he was living in Watauga in Carter County, Tenn. See cart025 for Fra[z]ier's handwritten account of Gen. Stoneman's raid late in the war.
